PersonDisability.name: PersonDisability
PersonDisability.description: Represents information about a person's disability.

IndividualId.description: The individual associated with the disability.

IsAccommodationRequired.description: Indicates whether the individual requires accommodation.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the disability.

VerificationDate.description: The date when the disability was verified.

VerifiedBy.description: Specifies the verifier of the disability in the individual.

VerifiedByOther.description: Specifies the verifier of the disability if its other than what is listed in VerifiedBy.
